mapper.select: select a.*, t.id tenant_id, t.name tenant_name from ac_account a left join ac_tenant t on a.tenant_id=t.id where a.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ac_account (id, login_name, type, password, display_name, tenant_id, mobile, phone, email, status, creator, create_time) values(#{id}, #{loginName}, #{type}, #{password}, #{displayName}, #{tenantId}, #{mobile}, #{phone}, #{email}, 1, #{creator}, now())

insert into ac_account (id, login_name, type, password, display_name, tenant_id, mobile, phone, email, status, grade, creator, create_time) values(#{id}, #{loginName}, 1, #{password}, #{loginName}, #{tenantId}, #{mobile}, #{phone}, #{email}, 1, 0, #{creator}, now())
mapper.update: update ac_account set status=#{status}, editor=#{editor}, edit_time=now() where id in #{id}
mapper.delete: update ac_account set password=#{passwd} where id in #{id}
